example.ladino: Dicho sefaradi: Martes, ni te kázes ni te embárkes, ni de tu famiya no te espártes.
example.ladino_html: Dicho sefaradi: Martes, ni te kázes ni te embárkes, ni de tu famiya no te espártes.

example.ladino: Dicho sefaradi: De tu pan no komí, de tu palavra me afalagí.
example.ladino_html: Dicho sefaradi: De tu pan no komí, de tu palavra me afalagí.

example.ladino: Dicho sefaradi: De tu pan no komí, de tu palavra me afalagí.
example.ladino_html: Dicho sefaradi: De tu pan no komí, de tu palavra me afalagí.

example.english: What you do not do with your hand, not even your brother does it.
example.ladino: Dicho sefaradi: Lo ke no azes tú kon tu mano, no lo aze ni tu ermano.
example.ladino_html: Dicho sefaradi: Lo ke no azes tú kon tu mano, no lo aze ni tu ermano.

example.english: What you do not do with your hand, not even your brother does it.
example.ladino: Dicho sefaradi: Lo ke no azes tú kon tu mano, no lo aze ni tu ermano.
example.ladino_html: Dicho sefaradi: Lo ke no azes tú kon tu mano, no lo aze ni tu ermano.

example.english: you are a man
example.ladino: tu sos un ombre
example.ladino_html: tu sos un ombre

example.english: Do you drink milk or water?
example.ladino: Tu beves leche o agua?
example.ladino_html: Tu beves leche o agua?

example.english: Do you eat bread and drink water? Yes, I eat bread and drink water.
example.ladino: Tu komes pan i beves agua? Si, yo komo pan i bevo agua.
example.ladino_html: Tu komes pan i beves agua? Si, yo komo pan i bevo agua.

example.english: Do you live in Jerusalem? Yes, I live in Jerusalem
example.ladino: Tu moras en Yerushalayim? Si, yo moro en Yerushalayim
example.ladino_html: Tu moras en Yerushalayim? Si, yo moro en Yerushalayim

example.english: Do you live in Tel Aviv? No, I don't live in Tel Aviv
example.ladino: Tu moras en Tel Aviv? No, yo no moro en Tel Aviv
example.ladino_html: Tu moras en Tel Aviv? No, yo no moro en Tel Aviv

example.english: Do you have animals? Yes, I have a cat.
example.ladino: Tu tienes animales? Si, yo tengo un gato.
example.ladino_html: Tu tienes animales? Si, yo tengo un gato.

example.english: Do you have animals? No I don't have animals.
example.ladino: Tu tienes animales? No, yo no tengo animales.
example.ladino_html: Tu tienes animales? No, yo no tengo animales.

example.english: Do you have children?
example.ladino: Tu tienes kriaturas?
example.ladino_html: Tu tienes kriaturas?

example.english: What do you work?
example.ladino: Ke tu lavoras?
example.ladino_html: Ke tu lavoras?

example.english: Do you work or study?
example.ladino: Tu lavoras o estudias?
example.ladino_html: Tu lavoras o estudias?

example.english: your house
example.ladino: tu kaza
example.ladino_html: tu kaza

example.english: Where do you live, in a village or in a city?
example.ladino: Ande tu bives, en un kazal o en una sivdad?
example.ladino_html: Ande tu bives, en un kazal o en una sivdad?

example.english: Greetings to your wife
example.ladino: Saludes a tu mujer
example.ladino_html: Saludes a tu mujer

example.english: Greetings to your husband
example.ladino: Saludes a tu marido
example.ladino_html: Saludes a tu marido

example.english: your book
example.ladino: tu livro
example.ladino_html: tu livro

example.english: You have to meet my family
example.ladino: Tu deves konoser a mi famiya
example.ladino_html: Tu deves konoser a mi famiya

example.english: your grandmother is old
example.ladino: tu gran-mama es vieja
example.ladino_html: tu gran-mama es vieja

example.english: You have cousins.
example.ladino: Tu tienes primos.
example.ladino_html: Tu tienes primos.

example.english: Your father lives alone
example.ladino: Tu padre bive solo
example.ladino_html: Tu padre bive solo

example.english: Do you live alone? No, I live with my father.
example.ladino: Tu bives solo? No, yo bivo kon mi padre.
example.ladino_html: Tu bives solo? No, yo bivo kon mi padre.

example.english: How is your mother-in-law?
example.ladino: Komo es tu esfuegra?
example.ladino_html: Komo es tu esfuegra?

example.english: Do you travel by car or by bus?
example.ladino: Tu viajas kon oto o kon otobus?
example.ladino_html: Tu viajas kon oto o kon otobus?
